title: Proof "Global Warming" is just horse shit
body:
I asked my grandpa who is like a 100 years old "was it colder back then when less gas was used for global warming"

He said :" naw feels the same, home always felt this hot"

This was a similar response to other old people I asked which said temp felt the same when they were younger.

WTF NASA Y U LIE TO US
